title: Thunderbird display
content: A new hard drive was installed last week. Then had to download and install Thunderbird again. But it looks different. The window is all the incoming list. It used to be divided by the top half showing the list and the bottom half showing whichever message I clicked on. Now I have to double click on the message and it opens a new tab. How do I make it go back to the way it used to display. That was a lot less clunky than opening a new tab. I'm also having trouble finding my calendar and address book. But that's a question for the Geek Squad who told me they backed up all my data.

title: Sync'ing Google Contacts and CardDAV error
content:
I am trying to add my Google Contacts as an address book in Thunderbird so that I can sync my contacts, but I get an error in the process. Below are the sterps I've taken.

I go into my address book and add a new contact list. After I select Add new CardDAV address book and enter my username in the field. Thunderbird automatically fills in the location. I select next.

A web window opens asking me to sign in with my Google account. I enter my email address and click next. This is when I get the error 

"400. That’s an error.

The server cannot process the request because it is malformed. It should not be retried. That’s all we know."

The URL in the sign-in is quite complex with many parameters and referrers, but I am hesitant to post it here as it includes email addresses and other encoded information that I do not wish to get scraped.

Any ideas?

FYI: I did try CardBook, as many other posts refer to it, but I could not figure it out in a couple of minutes, so I need to read the documentation. But I would like to get the integrated solution working without the add-on if I can.
creator: michaelbelew

title: Thunderbird 142.0 (macOS, Apple Silicon) – “Download All Attachments” button not working
content:
Hi,

I am currently using Thunderbird version 142.0 on macOS 15.6.1 (Apple Silicon), and I noticed an issue with the “Download All Attachments” button.

When I open an email with multiple attachments, the button at the top of the attachment list does not work. Clicking it has no effect, and I have to manually download each attachment one by one. This is quite inconvenient.

Is this a known bug, or if there are any workarounds available?

Thank you for your assistance.

Best regards, Jason
creator: jasonhsutuna

title: Import profile successfull, but after restart some account are empty
content:
Hi,

I try to restore a profile folder (Thunderbird 141 windows).

I use Import procedure from Thunderbird (same effects with ImportExportNG plugin).

I select the folder including profile, successfull. All account and folders, emails are OK.

After restarting Thunderbird, all accounts are listed, but some are empty (IMAP) : folders and emails gone, and they where all perfectly restored before the restart.

I try to switch to "offline mode" (perhaps a sync with server needed despite ?).

(other request suppport related : https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/questions/1428421 ).

Thanks.

title: Empty trash option missing in right click menu
content:
Hello,

I wanted to empty the trash in one of my email accounts in Thunderbird. Normally I would right click on the trash folder and then there is the option to empty the trash. Unlike ever before and on this one account (gmx imap) this option doesn't exist anymore - I can't empty the trash. I went into the account settings and ticked the option to empty the trash on exiting but after quitting Thunderbird and restarting it, the email is still in the trash.

What's wrong here? My suspicion is that I would need to mark the email in the trash as read and only then I would get back the option to empty the trash? I don't want to do that, I want to be able to empty the trash whenever I want to or on exiting Thunderbird. I don't want to be forced to mark an email as read before beeing allowed to delete it. Please help.

By the way, it was very difficult to even get to post this question here. I also don't really find this forum to be user friendly. Is this supposed to be the official Thunderbird forum? Or is that somewhere elese? Thanks.
creator: chris.brueckner

title: Dopo l'aggiornamento di Thunderbird non funziona più bene il calendario GMAIL
content:
Dopo l'aggiornamento del programma non funzionano più bene i due calendari collegati ed email GMAIL che fino ad oggi hanno sempre funzionato alla grande. In particolare, quando vi sia un evento, esso appare giustamente in POP UP ma non è possibile: cancellarlo o posporlo. E' molto noioso perchè ogni volta che apro Thunderbird o aggiorno la ricezione questo accade. A volte dice: calendario Marco GMAIL non disponibile Se provo a cancellare, posporre o modificare mi risponde con una stringa che contiene l'errore 400

RIBADISCO CHE TUTTO E' COMINICATO NON APPENA AGGIORNATO IL PROGRAMMA AD UNA NUOVA VERSIONE

title: Tags disappear when replying
content:
Hi there,

I use extensively tags in my workflow, and I just switched from Gmail to Thunderbird. My only problem is that in Thunderbird, tags apply to a single message and not to the whole thread.

In other words, if I reply to an email with a certain tag, the answer is not tagged.

Is there a way to apply tags to a message and then the whole thread will keep the same tag?

Tank you in advance for your help, Best regards,

Livio
